## Description {#details}

Extra information, not in <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcregisterdesc">MCRegisterDesc</a>, about registers.

These are used by codegen, not by MC.

Definition at line 215 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetregisterinfo-h">TargetRegisterInfo.h</a>.
